com.luca.exercise

Class Features

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.luca.exercise.Features

  • public class Features
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility type that defines binary features that are used to calculate the conditional probability of a single word to belong to a given class.
    Author:
    luca
